FREEZER BREAKFAST BURRITOS (40G PROTEIN)

Meal prep champion! These freezer-friendly breakfast burritos pack 40g protein each. Make a batch on Sunday, reheat all week for a protein-packed breakfast in under 5 minutes.

40g
Protein
420
Calories
45m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 burrito

Carbs32g
Fat16g
Fiber4g
Sugar3g
Sodium580mg
DifficultyEasy

MEAL PREP INFO

Batch Size

12 servings

Storage

Fridge: 5 days
Freezer: 3 months

Reheat Options

Microwave: 2-3 min from fridge, 4-5 min from frozen Remove foil. Wrap in damp paper towel. Microwave on 50% powe...
Airfryer: 8-10 min from frozen Remove foil. Place seam-side down....

INGREDIENTS

  • 12 large flour tortillas (10-inch)
  • 680g (1.5 lbs) lean turkey sausage
  • 720ml (24 oz) liquid egg whites
  • 1 red bell pepper, diced
  • 1 green bell pepper, diced
  • 1 medium onion, diced
  • 170g (6 oz) reduced-fat Mexican cheese blend
  • 5g cumin
  • 5g chili powder
  • 3g garlic powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Cook the Sausage

In a large skillet over medium-high heat, cook turkey sausage until browned and crumbled, about 8-10 minutes. Season with cumin, chili powder, and garlic powder. Transfer to a large bowl.

2

Sauté Vegetables

In the same skillet, add peppers and onion. Sauté until softened, about 5 minutes. Add to the bowl with sausage.

3

Scramble Egg Whites

Wipe skillet clean, spray with cooking spray. Add egg whites and scramble over medium heat until just set. Season with salt and pepper. Add to bowl.

4

Combine Filling

Add shredded cheese to the bowl. Toss everything together until well combined. Let cool for 10 minutes.

5

Assemble Burritos

Place about 3/4 cup filling in center of each tortilla. Fold in sides, then roll tightly from bottom to top. Place seam-side down.

6

Wrap and Store

Let cool completely. Wrap each burrito tightly in foil. For freezing, place wrapped burritos in freezer bags and label with date.
